trans-unit.source: Exposes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"></xref> that is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The column that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header"></xref>.
The automation peer for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
Gets the control type for the header that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.HeaderItem"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets a name that differentiates the header that is represented by this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.

The type name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header"></xref> property that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> object:

`patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> object that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> can be sorted.

`patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> object that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> can be resized by the user.
`patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
`patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.
The current object, if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, `null`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
`false` in all cases.
Sends a request to activate a control and initiate its single, unambiguous action.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
Scrolls the header and column that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref> into view.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
Gets a value that specifies whether the column can be moved.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> interface.
`false` in all cases.
Gets a value that specifies whether the column can be resized.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> interface.
`true` if the element can be resized; otherwise `false`.
Gets a value that specifies whether the control can be rotated.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> interface.
`false` in all cases.
Throws an exception in all cases.
The column that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> cannot be moved.
This parameter is not used.
This parameter is not used.
In all cases.
Resizes the width of the column that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> interface.
The new width of the column, in pixels.
This parameter is not used.
The column that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref> cannot be resized.
Throws an exception in all cases.
The column that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> cannot be rotated.
This parameter is not used.
In all cases.
Makes the virtual column fully accessible as a UI Automation element.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider> interface.
